/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. Cars and trucks are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and activity in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, providing a beautiful backdrop to the urban scene below.
